item.title: 分析师称卡尼推迟预算加剧加拿大经济不确定性
item.description: 在彭博社的一项调查中，大多数经济学家表示，加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）将加拿大预算推迟到今年晚些时候的决定增加了经济的不确定性，但不太可能引发投资者的担忧。【原文：Prime Minister Mark Carney’s decision to delay Canada’s budget until later this year increases economic uncertainty but isn’t likely to spark worries among investors, say a majority of economists in a Bloomberg survey.】

item.title: 科威特财富基金加入微软支持的 300 亿美元人工智能企业
item.description: 科威特的主权财富基金正在加入微软公司支持的一项计划，为全球人工智能基础设施提供 300 亿美元的资金支持，这个石油资源丰富的海湾国家正寻求进入这个蓬勃发展的行业。【原文：Kuwait’s sovereign wealth fund is joining a Microsoft Corp.-backed initiative to bankroll $30 billion in artificial intelligence infrastructure globally, as the oil-rich Gulf nation looks to tap into the booming sector.】

item.title: 法国参议院修正快时尚法案，将矛头指向 Shein 和 Temu
item.description: 法国参议员们正试图加强旨在监管快速时尚的立法计划，将矛头指向中国创立的申银万国集团有限公司（Shein Group Ltd.）和特姆（Temu）等超廉价服装销售商。【原文：French senators are seeking to sharpen planned legislation aimed at regulating fast fashion to target sellers of ultra-cheap clothing such as Chinese-founded Shein Group Ltd. and Temu.】

item.title: 加拿大大火阻碍重要油流，美国主要油价指数走强
item.description: 由于加拿大的野火威胁到美国重要的储存中心，限制了欧佩克+增加供应的影响，衡量美国石油市场强度的主要指标正在飙升。【原文：Key gauges of US oil market strength are soaring as wildfires in Canada risk flows to critical American storage hubs, limiting the impact of OPEC+ supply increases.】

item.title: 法国称与中国的干邑调查会谈可能取得积极成果
item.description: 法国贸易部长表示，他相信北京和巴黎能够解决因干邑白兰地关税引发的争执。【原文：France’s trade minister said he believes Beijing and Paris can resolve a spat over duties on Cognac that is hammering French producers and complicating broader discussions on global commerce.】

item.title: 棕榈滩住房紧张引发 2.36 亿美元的宿舍公用事业交易
item.description: 棕榈滩大西洋大学（Palm Beach Atlantic University）的学生宿舍非常紧张，以至于一些申请者选择放弃入学。2.358 亿美元的高收益债券交易是学校扭转这一趋势的赌注。【原文：Student housing is so tight at Palm Beach Atlantic University that some applicants have chosen not to enroll. A $235.8 million high-yield bond deal is the school’s bet to reverse that trend.】

item.title: KKR 建立创纪录的 420 亿美元私人房地产贷款管道
item.description: KKR & Co.的商业地产融资数量创下了历史新高，随着房地产价格的重启以及其他贷款机构在市场波动中的回撤，预计将会有更多的交易。【原文：KKR & Co. has a record volume of commercial-property financings lined up, and expects more deals as property prices reset and other lenders pull back amid market volatility.】

item.title: 厄瓜多尔誓言重返债务市场，令债券飙升
item.description: 周二，在厄瓜多尔最高财政官员表示政府计划明年重返资本市场后，厄瓜多尔债券在新兴市场中涨幅最大。【原文：Ecuador bonds jumped the most in emerging markets on Tuesday after the nation’s top finance officer said the government plans to return to capital markets next year.】

item.title: 天达银行称增长乏力已使南非损失 2510 亿美元
item.description: Investec Wealth & Investment International 的一份报告称，如果南非与新兴市场国家一样，自 2010 年以来保持 4.5%的年增长率，那么南非的经济规模将比现在小 37%。【原文：South Africa’s economy is 37% smaller than it would have been had the country tracked its emerging-market peers and sustained annual growth of 4.5% since 2010, a report by Investec Wealth & Investment International said.】

item.title: 必和必拓支持的初创公司在智利浸出厂交付首批铜矿
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group）支持的一家智利初创企业已从智利北部矿区的一家示范工厂交付了首批阴极铜，因为该行业希望从质量较差的矿石中榨取更多金属。【原文：A Chilean startup backed by BHP Group has delivered its first copper cathodes from a demonstration plant at a mine site in northern Chile as the industry looks to squeeze out more metal from lower quality ore.】

item.title: 中国电动汽车制造商 Nio 将降低研发成本以实现盈亏平衡目标
item.description: Nio Inc. 的目标是减少高达 25% 的研发支出，力争在第四季度达到收支平衡的目标。【原文：Nio Inc. aims to reduce research and development spending by as much as 25% as it seeks to reach its break-even target by the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 随着 Beta 演示航班飞往肯尼迪机场，纽约市喧闹的天空也变得热闹起来
item.description: 纽约市可能永远也摆脱不了每天成千上万架直升机在游客和大人物身边飞来飞去的景象，但有一家公司承诺提供一种更安静的替代方案。【原文：New York City will probably never rid itself of the thousands of helicopters heard flying around tourists and bigwigs each day, but one company is promising a quieter alternative.】

item.title: 马斯克的 X 旨在通过蓝色检查免责声明安抚欧盟监管机构
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的社交网络 X 正在向用户展示有关该平台蓝色勾选程序的醒目免责声明，以平息欧盟内容监管机构的担忧，即该程序具有欺骗性，应予以全面改革。【原文：Elon Musk’s social network X is showing users a prominent disclaimer about the platform’s blue checkmark program in a bid to appease concerns from the European Union’s content regulators that it’s deceptive and should be overhauled.】

item.title: 荷兰国际集团首席执行官称荷兰政府危机有可能导致欧盟决策放缓
item.description: ING Groep NV 首席执行官 Steven van Rijswijk 表示，荷兰政府的垮台有可能导致与欧洲计划中的投资热潮相关的决策放缓。【原文：The collapse of the Dutch government risks slowing decisions related to Europe’s planned investment spree, said ING Groep NV Chief Executive Officer Steven van Rijswijk.】

item.title: 美国 4 月职位空缺意外增加，招聘人数回升
item.description: 美国 4 月份的职位空缺出乎意料地增加，增幅相当大，招聘人数也有所回升，这表明尽管经济不确定性加剧，但对工人的需求依然健康。【原文：US job openings unexpectedly rose in April in a fairly broad advance and hiring picked up, indicating demand for workers remains healthy despite heightened economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 美联储博斯蒂克希望在通胀问题上取得更多进展，但不急于缩表
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）表示，他并不急于调整利率，并补充说，尽管最近的物价数据令人鼓舞，但他希望看到在通胀方面取得 "更多 "进展。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic said he’s in no rush to move interest rates, adding he wants to see “a lot” more progress on inflation despite recent encouraging price data.】

item.title: 特朗普抨击兰德-保罗 "疯狂 "抵制债务限额减税法案
item.description: 周二上午，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普攻击财政保守派兰德-保罗是 "疯子"，他向不情愿的共和党参议员施压，要求他们迅速推进他提出的大规模税收和支出方案。【原文：President Donald Trump attacked fiscal conservative Rand Paul as “crazy” Tuesday morning as he pressed reluctant Republican senators to move forward swiftly with his massive tax and spending package.】

item.title: 英国央行官员在通胀路径不明的情况下为不同观点辩护
item.description: 英格兰银行的利率制定者们为他们对货币政策方向的广泛观点进行了辩护，他们向立法者们阐述了对通胀前景的截然不同的看法。【原文：Bank of England rate-setters defended their wide range of views on the direction of monetary policy as they laid out to lawmakers starkly different opinions on the outlook for inflation.】

item.title: 现代、起亚出售欧拉电动车股份，加剧股价下滑
item.description: 韩国现代汽车公司和起亚汽车公司周二出售了约1.36亿股Ola Electric Mobility Ltd.的股票，而就在几天前，这家印度电动摩托车公司公布的季度亏损额增加了一倍多。【原文：South Korean automakers Hyundai Motor Co. and Kia Corp. sold about 136 million shares in Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. on Tuesday, just days after the Indian e-scooter firm posted quarterly losses that had more than doubled.】

item.title: 增长担忧重现，美股开盘摇摆不定
item.description: 美国股市周二开盘时有所波动，因为总部设在巴黎的经合组织警告说，唐纳德-特朗普的贸易政策已使世界经济陷入低迷，人们对经济增长的担忧再次浮现。【原文：US equities fluctuated at the open on Tuesday, as concerns about growth resurfaced after Paris-based OECD warned that Donald Trump’s trade policies have tipped the world economy into a downturn.】

item.title: 俄罗斯原油流量下降拖累出口价值跌至两年低点
item.description:
截至6月1日，四周平均原油流量每天减少17万桶

。【原文：

Four-week average crude flows fell by 170,000 barrels a day in the period to June 1

】

item.title: 俄罗斯放弃土耳其为欧洲天然气市场开后门的想法
item.description: 俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）悄然搁置了在土耳其开发新天然气配送中心的计划，关闭了自乌克兰入侵以来失去的在欧洲市场重新站稳脚跟的潜在机会之门。【原文：Russia’s Gazprom PJSC has quietly shelved plans to develop a new gas distribution hub in Turkey, closing the door on a potential opportunity to regain a foothold in European markets lost since the invasion of Ukraine.】

item.title: 南非高等法院驳回停止提高燃油税的请求
item.description: 南非高等法院驳回了反对党 "经济自由斗士"（Economic Freedom Fighters）为阻止政府提高燃油税而提起的诉讼。【原文：South Africa’s High Court dismissed a lawsuit filed by the opposition Economic Freedom Fighters party that sought to stop the government from raising fuel levies.】

item.title: 报告称肯尼亚是该地区走私黄金的枢纽
item.description: 根据非政府组织瑞士援助署的一份报告，肯尼亚是包括南苏丹和刚果民主共和国在内的其他非洲国家走私黄金的中转枢纽。【原文：Kenya serves as a transit hub for smuggled gold from other African countries, including South Sudan and the Democratic Republic of Congo, according to a report by SwissAid, a non-governmental organization.】

item.title: 17 万亿美元资产热潮被抨击为 "成本高昂、浪费严重
item.description: 华尔街称这是另类资产的黄金时代。理查德-恩尼斯（Richard Ennis）花了几十年时间帮助养老金和捐赠基金设计现代投资组合，他认为这是一种代价高昂的妄想，从投资组合中耗费了数十亿美元；未来几十年，这种妄想将会破灭。【原文：Wall Street calls it a golden age for alternative assets. Richard Ennis, who spent decades helping pensions and endowments devise modern portfolios, calls it a costly delusion draining billions from portfolios — one that will come undone in the coming decades.】

item.title: 博通发布旨在提高人工智能芯片性能的新装备
item.description:
数据中心交换机将让客户从 Nvidia 处理器中获得更多

。【原文：

Data center switch will let customers get more from their Nvidia processors

】

item.title: Thoma Bravo 为新旗舰收购基金融资 243 亿美元
item.description: Thoma Bravo 为其最新的旗舰私募股权基金募集到 243 亿美元资金，在吸引新投资者资金方面，市场充满挑战。【原文：Thoma Bravo has raised $24.3 billion for its latest flagship private equity fund in a challenging market for attracting new investor capital.】

item.title: 维多利亚的秘密称关闭网站的安全事件可能影响业绩
item.description: 维多利亚的秘密公司（Victoria's Secret & Co.【原文：Victoria’s Secret & Co. said a security incident that caused it to shut down its e-commerce site may hurt results for the current quarter.】

item.title: 前卡莱尔直接借贷公司负责人携新版私募股权投资手册亮相公司
item.description: 在为 KKR & Co.和 Carlyle Group Inc.等私募股权投资公司工作多年后，Aren LeeKong 开始尝试不同的投资模式。【原文：After years of working for the likes of private equity firms KKR & Co. and Carlyle Group Inc., Aren LeeKong is betting on a different investing model.】

item.title: 越南终止二胎政策以遏制出生率下降
item.description: 越南废除了一项限制家庭生育不超过两个孩子的长期政策，因为该国正在努力应对出生率下降的问题；这一政策带来的人口危机可能会破坏未来的增长前景。【原文：Vietnam abolished a long-standing policy limiting families to having no more than two children as the nation grapples with a declining birth rate — posing a demographic crunch that could undermine future growth prospects.】
